talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
Hwaran's pets sometimes get out of their cage.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Subdue, but do not kill... This is going to be complicated.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
She adores them.
How pampered she is... She issued the strict order to subdue but not kill them.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
I know what you're thinking, but don't worry.
Your only mission is to scout. Subduing them will be a job for the various factions.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So where can I carry out the scouting?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
The generous Hwaran has given
each of the factions a good chance to make a contribution.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I'll have to start by looking in the streets first.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
It's the job of the scout to figure that out.
However, it would be dangerous if those "pets" started roaming around the streets.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Red Lotus Palace Outskirts? Loser's exile place…? Or... Sohyang river dam!)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
That would be a good start.
Apparently some howling was heard around Red Lotus Palace Outskirts...

$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
(Jamihwa smiles meaningfully.)
Of course, not just anyone can go there.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
Then I assume you've agreed to take on the mission, so I'll prepare the reward.
<html>$[Guide] Scout, Discover, Return$</html>

$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
Then I assume you've agreed to take on the mission, so I'll prepare the reward.

$Strange Footprints$
(Those deep footprints stand out.)

$Strange Footprints$
(There are thick footprints in one corner of an empty street.)

${user_nick}$
Hwaran's pet must be huge considering the size of these footprints.
I can't imagine something like this could roam a crowded street unnoticed.

$Strange Footprints$
(There is a faint smell around the footprints. You feel a little dazed when you smell it.)

$Strange Footprints$
(There is a faint smell around the footprints. You feel a little dazed when you smell it.)

$Strange Claw Marks$
There are claw marks from something that seems to have scratched the ground over and over.
A glance to the side reveals there are scratches on the door post as well.

${user_nick}$
There's no way a beast or monster would scratch like this if it was just walking away.
This is probably... scratches from a struggle. It scratched the post frantically as well.

${user_nick}$
I can smell the same scent as before. What is it? This hazy feeling...
It smells like medicine...

$Strange Claw Marks$
(Anyway, judging from the claw marks, something seems to have gone through the huge door.)

$Strange Claw Marks$
(Anyway, judging from the claw marks, something seems to have gone through the huge door.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I found its trail on the<FONT color=#086171>street</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
You always come at the right time.
I like that in a person.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It looks like it went out through the southwest exit of Red Lotus Palace.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
Oh... That was close.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>And, there was a<FONT color=#a82424> mysterious scent</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
(Jamihwa smiles contentedly.)
You're such a talented person... You've achieved something worthy of your reputation.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do you know about the scent that makes you dizzy when you smell it?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
A scent? Your taste is truly unique.
It's the stench of a monster.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Is that how Hwaran controls the monsters?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
There is a similar item among the goods sold by the Goldfish Merchant Guild.
A beast-taming perfume that can turn a wild leopard into a sweet kitten.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(Was it really a coincidence? Or... on purpose?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
You're lucky. Maybe that's why there haven't been any victims yet.
If you were to have run into it... I'm not sure you would have survived.

$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
Hwaran will be pleased now that you have successfully carried out your scouting mission.
With the search complete, all that's left is defeating it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#a82424>Now and in the days to come</FONT>, too.
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
Yes. I will now send a secret message to each faction.
If you continue to work with the factions and please Hwaran, you will be generously rewarded.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(What is she going to do with the factions?)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Head Merchant Jamihwa$
Hwaran's treasure vault is endless.
There will be more opportunities for you to show your ability, so please bring honor to the factions.
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: Scout
journal.contents:
Investigate the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.
Jamihwa is requesting absolute secrecy. A reconnaissance mission that you can't tell anyone about. What is behind all this? The only clue you have is the wailing sound heard near Red Lotus Palace Outskirts. Whatever it is could be a danger to the townspeople. You'd better investigate the matter first, starting with the streets.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace-???
journal.destination: Investigate Streets of Red Lotus Palace
journal.todo_msg: Investigate the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.

journal.title: Discovery
journal.contents:
Investigate the Streets of Red Lotus Palace some more.
As soon as you entered the Streets of Red Lotus Palace, you saw the huge footprints. How could a monster with feet this big have simply walked through a crowded street without anyone noticing? Did it only prowl at night or at dawn when there were no people? You'll have to investigate this further.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace-???
journal.destination: Further Investigate Streets of Red Lotus Palace
journal.todo_msg: Investigate the Streets of Red Lotus Palace some more.

journal.title: Return
journal.contents:
Report to Head Merchant Jamihwa.
Something smells fishy. Judging from the claw marks, Hwaran's "pet" roamed the streets for a while when no one was around and escaped through the southwest exit of Red Lotus Palace... Or it might have been dragged away by someone. It's time to report the matter to Jamihwa.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street-Head Merchant Jamihwa
journal.todo_msg: Issue a report to Head Merchant Jamihwa.

journal.title: Report
journal.contents:
Speak with Head Merchant Jamihwa.
Jamihwa tells you that Hwaran will be pleased after you complete the scouting mission. She also said that a message would soon be sent to the faction leaders telling them that Hwaran's pet would be subdued and captured alive. However, the mission doesn't seem as simple as it appears.

Red Lotus Palace Main Street-Head Merchant Jamihwa
